page.title: 18FAVOURITE PASTIMES
page.content:
We carried out a survey among 10-11 year olds to find their favourite pastimes. { Watch TV 11 {Play with an electronic game 11 {Play on a bicycle 10 {Play with a computer 7 {Play tennis 7 {Walk the dog 4
The favourite TV. programme was The Young Ones. This is about 4 young people who do funny things like hammer nails into each others heads and throw chairs at each other.
Electronic games are small computer games and most of them would fit in your pocket. They are powered by battery and controlled by a button or joystick. Illuminated shapes move about on small screens.
